column4: hi guys im having trouble trying to execute this file  virtualbox-2.1_2.1.0-41146_Ubuntu_intrepid_i386.deb
hi guys I need some help with executing this file  virtualbox-2.1_2.1.0-41146_Ubuntu_intrepid_i386.deb
what happens when you double-click it?
he means open a terminal and type in man dpkg
.deb is not a tar.  Run this in a terminal: sudo dpkg -l ~/Desktop/virtualbox-2.1_2.1.0-41146_Ubuntu_intrepid_i386.deb
it's perl, not python.  perl should be installed by default.  To run that file, do perl vmware-setup.pl
what folder is that file in?
vmware-server-distrib?  is it on your desktop?
do this in a terminal: cd ~/Desktop/vmware-server-distrib; perl ./vmware-setup.pl
what is the output of the command cwd?
to run it, type "cwd" (without quotes) in a terminal
